Flyout_Signup_Description.message: Try it now, free! You'll keep earning points towards great rewards when you search with Bing.

Flyout_Signup_Disclaimer.message: Offer valid for new Microsoft Rewards members. You will receive emails about Microsoft Rewards, including offers about Microsoft and partner products.

Flyout_Signup_Separator.description: Separator between Terms and Privacy links

Flyout_Signup_SignIn.description: Rewards flyout Signup sign in link

RewardsDesc.message: Use the Microsoft Rewards extension to find new ways to earn every day, easily track your points and set your default search to Bing
